title: 2 bed w Bamboo floors, AC, granite kitchen
posting_body: ['2,400.00/ 2br 1 bath -- Killer Remodel!', 'All New Kitchen and Euro-bath.', 'Avail.', 'Early August', 'Completely new designer bath, cool updated kitchen with all appliances, AC, bamboo flooring, recessed lighting & new wood blinds.', 'Immaculately maintained building is newly landscaped and includes Laundry Room with brand new commercial washer and dryer just steps from unit.', "You'll find Echo Park Pool and Vista Hermosa Park at each end of the street--the newly refurbished Echo Park Lake is 4 blocks away.", 'Close to everything.', 'Excellent credit A MUST!', 'This unit is a 1st floor apartment – however, from the parking lot, the building is accessed by stairs.', 'Features:', 'Newly remodeled kitchen with black granite counters, tiled backsplash, stainless sink and designer fixtures', 'Brand new bath, euro vanity, glass tile, lighting and fixtures', 'Air conditioning', 'Eco-friendly bamboo flooring throughout', 'Bright, spacious floor plan with ceiling fans in bedrooms and living room', 'Recessed halogen lighting', 'Includes all appliances (microwave, range, dishwasher, disposal, fridge)', 'Laundry Room just steps from your unit', 'Both bedrooms feature spacious mirrored closets with fully adjustable closet organizers.', 'Direct access to gated, off-street parking for one car', 'Rear terrace perfect for your bar-b-que and patio set', 'Walk to Echo Park Pool, Vista Hermosa Park, Echo Park Lake,', 'Minutes from Silverlake, Downtown, Hollywood, Pasadena', 'Details', 'Rent $2,400.00 per month', "Move in: first month's rent + $3,500.00 security deposit", 'Approved kitty requires additional $500 deposit  - Sorry no dogs', 'Excellent credit and references a must', 'Water and parking for ONE CAR included / tenant pays gas and electric', 'Move-in early August', 'Unit is occupied', 'Open house Saturday august 6 11a-1pm', 'Shown by appointment Friday august 5th at 11am-12noon']
